>
[Vestige Lenses](/Equipment.aspx?ID=767)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 25</row>

**Price** 40 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These simple lenses are alchemically treated to detect the faint smoke trail from a piece of specially formulated sandalwood incense. This incense has an odor undetectable by most people and a long burn time, making it perfect for discreetly tracking individuals. A stick of this incense costs 1 sp and can safely burn for up to 8 hours. While wearing the lenses, you see alchemical fumes in a distinct green tint, granting you a +1 item bonus to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks to [Track](/Actions.aspx?ID=66) a creature marked with the incense and to Perception checks to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) any alchemical vapors. If the smoke is fresh, Tracking via the incense's fumes might use a lower DC than normal for tracking a creature walking on firm surfaces.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
